#BlackMagicCraft #Episode135

WATCH EPISODE ONE: https://youtu.be/7sHdZTaQTD8

In part two of this miniature foam house series I tackle a very important step, STUCCO....or plaster, or whatever you wish to call it. I demonstrate four different options and ultimately end up using a new one that I absolutely love. 

GRAB SOME UNSANDED TILE GROUT:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)
